i1.name: Assassin's_Mark
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Akali's''' damaging [[champion ability|abilities]] against enemy {{tip|champions}} will mark a ring around them for 4 seconds, granting her {{as|{{pp|key=%|30 to 60 for 4|1 to 16}} {{sti|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds while moving away from them. Subsequent damaging abilities against enemy champions while a ring is active will only refresh its duration.

If '''Akali''' leaves the ring within its duration, she regains the {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} while moving towards enemy champions for 2 seconds and gains ''Swinging Kama'' for 4 seconds, during which she cannot create another ring.

{{sbc|Swinging Kama:}} '''Akali's''' next basic attack's {{sti|range}} is doubled and deals {{pp|35 to 53 for 7; then + 9*x for 6; then + 15*x|formula=+3 per level until lvl 7; then +9 until lvl 13, then +15|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 55% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Akali's damaging champion ability against enemy champions will mark a ring around them for 4 seconds, granting her 1 to 16 ‒ undefined bonus movement speed for 2 seconds while moving away from them. Subsequent damaging abilities against enemy champions while a ring is active will only refresh its duration.
If Akali leaves the ring within its duration, she regains the bonus movement speed while moving towards enemy champions for 2 seconds and gains Swinging Kama for 4 seconds, during which she cannot create another ring.
Swinging Kama: Akali's next basic attack's range is doubled and deals 35 − 53 for 7; then + 9*x for 6; then + 15*x (based on level) (+ 60% bonus AD) (+ 55% AP) bonus magic damage.
i1.notes:
* Enemies cannot see the ring, but can see the empower effect.
* ''Swinging Kama'' gives a static '''bonus''' range which doesn't change if '''Akali's''' range changes during it (i.e {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}):
** If ''Rapid Firecannon'' fully charges within ''Swinging Kama''<nowiki>'</nowiki>s duration, '''Akali's''' total range increases to {{tt|337.5|125{{times}}2{{times}}1.35}}.
** If ''Rapid Firecannon'' fully charges before gaining ''Swinging Kama'', '''Akali's''' total range is increased to {{tt|395|125{{times}}1.35{{times}}2 + 125{{times}}1.35 (which is the bonus range Swinging Kama gives){{times}}0.35 (further increased by Rapid Firecannon)}}.
* The ring will be created around the last target hit by ''{{ai|Five Point Strike|Akali}}''.
* The ring's center is offset 120 units away from the enemy's center, towards akali.
* The empowered attack can be {{tip|dodge|dodged}} and {{tip|block|blocked}}, and will be mitigated by {{tip|blind|blinds}}.

q1.name: Five_Point_Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Akali''' unleashes kunais in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit. Targets at maximum range are also {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 50% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Akali unleashes kunais in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit. Targets at maximum range are also slowed by 50% for 0.5 seconds.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 65% AD) (+ 60% AP)

w1.name: Twilight_Shroud
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Akali''' restores {{sti|{{as|80 energy}}}} over {{fd|0.4}} seconds, gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays over 2 seconds, and detonates a smoke bomb a fixed distance away in the target direction, creating a circular shroud that expands over the next 5 seconds into a ring. The shroud does not permeate terrain, and will expand toward nearby enemy champions. While the shroud is active, '''Akali's''' {{as|'''maximum''' energy}} is increased by {{as|80|energy}}.
Entering the shroud renders '''Akali''' {{tip|invisibility|invisible}}, unless she is {{tip|dash|dashing}}.

Declaring a basic attack or casting an ability will break the invisibility and prevent '''Akali''' from entering it for {{pp|type=minutes|changedisplay=true|round=3|1;0.9;0.825;0.725;0.625|1;8;11;20;30}} seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks and casts.
The {{ai|Shuriken Flip|Akali|marked}} section of ''Twilight Shroud'' will linger for the mark's duration, even after the shroud ends.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Akali restores 80 energy over 0.4 seconds, gains bonus movement speed that decays over 2 seconds, and detonates a smoke bomb a fixed distance away in the target direction, creating a circular shroud that expands over the next 5 seconds into a ring. The shroud does not permeate terrain, and will expand toward nearby enemy champions. While the shroud is active, Akali's maximum energy is increased by 80.
Entering the shroud renders Akali invisible, unless she is dashing.
Declaring a basic attack or casting an ability will break the invisibility and prevent Akali from entering it for 1;8;11;20;30 ‒ undefined seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks and casts.
The Akali's marked section of Twilight Shroud will linger for the mark's duration, even after the shroud ends.
w1.notes:
* '''Akali''' will also not gain the {{tip|invisibility}} if she is {{si|Recall|Recalling}}.
* It is possible for '''Akali''' to detonate the smoke bomb on the far side of terrain from her current location.
* The effects are applied before the cast time, and '''Akali''' can move during the cast time.

effects.str:
• Bonus Movement Speed: %
  • Shroud Duration:

e1.name: Shuriken_Flip
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Akali''' {{tip|dash|flips}} backward and, after the cast time, sends a shuriken in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit.

The shuriken ''marks'' the enemy or the last {{ai|Twilight Shroud|Akali|smoke}} section hit for 3 seconds, {{tip|standard sight|revealing}} them for the duration. While the target or smoke section is marked, ''Shuriken Flip'' can be recast.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Akali''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} towards the marked target or smoke section, consuming the mark, regardless of distance. Against enemies it deals {{as|magic damage}} upon arrival.
'''Akali''' will not flip backwards if she is {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} or {{tip|ground|grounded}} during the cast time.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Akali flips backward and, after the cast time, sends a shuriken in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.
The shuriken marks the enemy or the last Akali's smoke section hit for 3 seconds, revealing them for the duration. While the target or smoke section is marked, Shuriken Flip can be recast.
Recast: Akali dashes towards the marked target or smoke section, consuming the mark, regardless of distance. Against enemies it deals magic damage upon arrival.
Akali will not flip backwards if she is immobilized or grounded during the cast time.
e1.notes:
* '''Akali''' will track the target if they change locations.
** She will not stop tracking the target until she reaches them, as there is no maximum tracking distance.
* Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Shuriken Flip'' does not interrupt '''Akali's''' previous move or attack orders.
** The {{sbc|Recast}} does.
* ''Shuriken Flip'' cannot be recast if the target is not {{tip|sight|visible}} or is {{tip|untargetable}}.
* '''Akali''' will dash backwards up-to 400 units in a straight line. This dash can cross terrain if the end point is beyond it. If she would end the dash inside terrain, she will instead look for a location  in either direction left or right that is outside of terrain and dash there. If there is no such location, she will dash only up to the wall at her normal speed, ending the dash early.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
** The shuriken missile will fire from wherever '''Akali''' is at the end of the cast time (usually mid-dash), but always towards and reaching the location that was 825 units in front of her at the start of cast. The only exception is if she moves via {{si|Flash}}, in which case the range of the missile is decreased relative to the distance she blinked.
* Killing an enemy with the shuriken will still mark the last area of the {{ai|Twilight Shroud|Akali|shroud}} hit.
* Attempting to cast {{ai|Five Point Strike|Akali}} during either dash will buffer it to cast as soon as the dash ends.
{{ct|attack=false|move=false|cast={{ai|Twilight Shroud|Akali}} is usable. {{ai|Shuriken Flip|Akali}} is disabled for 10 seconds and then interrupts. Both dashes of {{ai|Perfect Execution|Akali}} interrupt.|items=true,,,interrupts,interrupts,,interrupts|spells=true,interrupts,true,true,false}}

r1.name: Perfect_Execution
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Akali''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} 750 units in the direction of the target enemy {{tip|champion}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies she passes through.

If '''Akali''' hits an enemy, she flips over them, continuing the ''dash'' up to its normal 750 range but at least another 150 units, for a total maximum dash distance of 900 units if the first enemy she hit was at the maximum dash range.
''Perfect Execution'' can be recast after {{fd|2.5}} seconds within 10 seconds of the first activation.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Akali''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} {{tt|800|Estimated}} units in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies she passes through, increased by {{as|{{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|0 to 200 for 11|0 to 70|formula=2.86% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health, capped at 70% '''missing''' health}}|health}}.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Akali dashes 750 units in the direction of the target enemy champion, dealing magic damage to enemies she passes through.
If Akali hits an enemy, she flips over them, continuing the dash up to its normal 750 range but at least another 150 units, for a total maximum dash distance of 900 units if the first enemy she hit was at the maximum dash range.
Perfect Execution can be recast after 2.5 seconds within 10 seconds of the first activation.
Recast: Akali dashes 800 units in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies she passes through, increased by 0 to 70 ‒ undefined.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Magic Damage|{{ap|60 to 200}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|60*3 to 200*3}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
*Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* Casting {{si|Flash}} during either dashes will interrupt them, but '''Akali''' will deal damage to any enemies she comes in contact with at the new location.
** Enemies already hit by either of ''Perfect Execution's'' casts cannot be affected more than once by the same cast.
